ModMetaData.name: Absolute Legends: Hair
ModMetaData.author: RE6AL
ModMetaData.description:
Mullets and other legendary styles. Homeless people, New Kids Turbo, Rednecks, and other fashion icons.
If used with HAIR MODDING PLUS - there's additional back texture layer for some hairstyles.
Constantly updating textures and rarely adding new styles.
